about_the_game:
What is it about?

A linear visual novel about cold-blooded demons showing an apathetic girl how people can be interesting.
Vicky is just a self-centered girl who was spending a few days at her boring grandmother's house when she ended up in the wrong place at the wrong time, talking to the wrong person... Or at least that's what she thinks. But for now, she has to prevent the Devil from being released.

Gameplay

In "The Devil Lives Down Here," you must interact with demons and solve small puzzles on each floor by moving pieces and interacting with their figures. You won't be able to tell what Vicky or the demons are thinking, but you can guess based on their expressions and iconography above their heads to try to figure out what plan Vicky is trying to execute to get out of this situation.

Features

  • Monochromatic dark atmosphere
  • 13 different demons
  • Optional auto mode for continuing dialogues

Add to your wishlist!
